snippet: General Manager Brian Cashman said on Monday that Sabathia was expected to be out for six weeks from the date of Thursday’s injection to treat his degenerative knee condition.
lead_paragraph: General Manager Brian Cashman said on Monday that Sabathia was expected to be out for six weeks from the date of Thursday’s injection to treat his degenerative knee condition.

headline.main: Yankees’ C.C. Sabathia to Miss at Least Six More Weeks
